Pre-Game Insights: Mexico vs Jamaica is scheduled for 22/06/2024 at 20:00 (GMT-5h) at NRG Stadium in Houston, TX.
Mexico is considered the favorite in Group B of the Copa America 2024.
Jamaica qualified directly for the tournament after a surprising victory over Canada in the CONCACAF Nations League.
Jamaica has a talented team with key players such as Michail Antonio, Andre Blake, Bobby Decordova-Reid, Demarai Gray, and Ethan Pinnock.
